channel.title: 317-474 Server help
channel.description:
hello guy's i look in posts and 90% of the times i look i see how do i change the ip's in the client...
Heres some help on how to do this.
ok let's start with a 317 shall we ?
ok 317's are all mostly done by client.java
go to client.java or- just Client
Do CTRL+F and search either these "0.0.0.0" - localhost "127.0.0.1 " localhost localhost means only YOU can login
"exmaple of an ip" "exampleip.no-ip.org" Change these to your no-ip or Hamachi or your real ip.
"example playerserver = 127.0.0.1 change to playerserver = "no-ip.org"
That's just an example!
Ok chaning the 317 client.
Go to client.java or Client "note not all clients use this"
search for either "0.0.0.0" "127.0.0.1" or just "ip."
Change to your ip.
And your done!
Compiling the server!
If your jdk is set in ur C: drive makesure it ' looks like this
HERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -classpath "D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -classpath
Changing it to your Jdk
1.6.0_21-18-16- is the most used 1's Change it to your JDK example Jdk setup V 6u18 so you'd change it to 18 !
Compile and done now login to your server to have a look around
next step putting the server online Portforwarding with Utorrent! www.utorrent.com
Download utorrent.
go to OPTINS
Prefrences
Port : will berandomized change it to 43594 and login!
blondey2010s@hotmail.com
Going to bed now tired next time i'ma show to host and put online a 474 and portforward with your router thanks!

item.title: 317-474 Server help
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

hello guy’s i look in posts and 90% of the times i look i see how do i change the ip’s in the client…

Heres some help on how to do this.

ok let’s start with a 317 shall we ?

ok 317’s are all mostly done by client.java

go to client.java or- just Client

Do CTRL+F and search either these “0.0.0.0” - localhost "127.0.0.1 " localhost
localhost means only YOU can login

“exmaple of an ip” “exampleip.no-ip.org” Change these to your no-ip or Hamachi or your real ip.

"example
playerserver = 127.0.0.1
change to
playerserver = “no-ip.org”

That’s just an example!

Ok chaning the 317 client.

Go to client.java or Client
“note not all clients use this”

search for either “0.0.0.0” “127.0.0.1” or just “ip.”

Change to your ip.

And your done!

Compiling the server!

If your jdk is set in ur C: drive makesure it ’ looks like this

                                       HERE

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe” -classpath
“D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe” -classpath

Changing it to your Jdk

1.6.0_21-18-16- is the most used 1’s
Change it to your JDK
example Jdk setup V 6u18 so you’d change it to 18 !

Compile and done now login to your server to have a look around

next step putting the server online
Portforwarding with Utorrent!
www.utorrent.com

Download utorrent.

go to OPTINS

Prefrences

Port : will berandomized change it to 43594 and login!

blondey2010s@hotmail.com

Going to bed now tired next time i’ma show to host and put online a 474 and portforward with your router thanks!
